text:
Putnam Exam | 2013: B1

\begin{array}{c}\n\text { Putnam } 2013: \text { B } 1 \\\n\qquad \begin{array}{c}\n2013 \\\nc(1)=1 \\\nc(2 n)=c(n) \\\nc(2 n+1)=(-1)^{n} c(n) \\\nn=0\n\end{array}\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Putnam } 2013: \text { B } 1 [/imath] [imath]\qquad \begin{array}{c}\n2013 [/imath] [imath]c(1)=1 [/imath] [imath]c(2 n)=c(n) [/imath] [imath]c(2 n+1)=(-1)^{n} c(n) [/imath] [imath]n=0[/imath]
